name: VRC Pro: Deluxe Electric On-Road Tracks
summary: This VRC PRO: Deluxe Electric On-Road Tracks pack gives you 5 additional on-road RC tracks from all around the world. Expand your electric on-road tracks. Experience real existing world class tracks. Join more events & more multiplayer sessions.

name: V.R. Virtua Racing
summary:
Virtua Racing is a polygon-based racing game in which you must beat an opponent, who is either human or computer controlled. In the conversion to the Saturn, many new features were added:

7 new tracks, which brings the total number of tracks in the game to 10.
4 new cars, which brings the total number of cars in the game to 5. The new cars are a go-kart, a Porsche 911, an F-160 racer, and a GTP-class car.
A new Grand Prix mode. The Grand Prix mode is a career simulation. You must work your way up from one class of vehicle to next be accumulating points in a series of races.

name: VR Battleship Yamato
summary:
Full Scale Restoration of the Japanese battleship “Yamato” in VR.

Battleship Yamato was constructed during the World War Ⅱ in 1941, and it was the biggest battleship ever built. Unfortunately, Yamato didn’t last through the war, and it sank to the bottom of the sea.
Now, battleship Yamato is completely restored in full scale in VR. It is based on the blueprints and the recollections of the actual crew who are still alive.
In this app, you can actually get on Yamato and walk across the deck, climb up the bridge, and go inside the ship.
See the Yamato crew taking command. View the explosions of the gun fire from a close distance.

name: VR Blade of Blocks
summary: VR Blade of Blocks is a first-person VR block-cutting game where players take on the role of a swordsman, slicing through various colorful blocks.

name: VR Escape From Jurassic Island
summary: This is a VR game that risks. The game is set on an abandoned and deserted dinosaur island. The island is covered with various types of dinosaurs with various types of different types of colors. Escape from this island is the most urgent thing for players.

name: Vritra: Complete Edition
summary: A challenge from ancient times delivered to gamers. That excitement from the past has returned.

name: Vritra
summary:
Throw down a challenge to all the 80s and 90s gamers. Get back the enthusiasm you had once!
Control the dragon and the vajras, and destroy the evil Dragon Emperor "VRITRA"!
Awesome graphics, powerful sound effects and amazing controls.
This ultimate 2D shooter is a step forward in the history of the shooting games!

name: VR Ping Pong
summary:
Ping Pong VR is the first simulator that thanks to VR technology, and with the help of SteamVR Controllers, brings a ping pong table into your lounge.
Using 1:1 scale with virtual reality, you will have the sensation of play ping pong in reality: Virtual reality teleports you inside voxel-style environments that until today you could only dream to visit.

name: VRC Pro: Deluxe Asia On-Road Tracks
summary: This VRC PRO: Deluxe Asia On-Road Tracks pack gives you 5 additional on-road RC tracks from Asia continent. Expand your electric on-road tracks. Experience real existing world class tracks. Join more events & more multiplayer sessions.

name: V Rising: Haunted Nights Castle Pack
summary:
Capture the essence of the season of decay with the Haunted Nights Castle Pack.

Surround yourself with dark symbols, candles within skulls, and hollowed-out cadavers of gourds. Pair them with tasteful windows and carpets that reflect the color of the falling leaves, and dress your walls with some tasteful spiderwebbing to set the mood.

This pack provides a host of options to decorate your castle in the theme of the autumnal season when the scorching sunlight hours begin to wane, and the creeping claws of death slowly take the verdant green plant life. Don’t be afraid of getting used to them, as once you acquire these decorations, you’ll be free to use them regardless of the time of year. What is time to an immortal creature of the night anyway?

The DLC is unlocked in parts after completing the Journal Quests: “Lord of Shadows,” “The First book in the Library” and “Expanding my Domain.”

name: VR Skater
summary: A skateboarding game designed from the ground up for virtual reality. VR Skater is a highly immersive street skateboarding game. It's a finely tuned mix between arcade and simulation.

name: V-Rally 3
summary:
Strap yourself in for the most intense and lifelike rally racing you've ever experienced. Introducing V-Rally 3, the next evolution in the leading rally racing franchise that has sold over 5 million copies worldwide.

Everything about V-Rally 3, from the highly detailed cars to the meticulously handcrafted tracks, creates unprecedented racing realism. V-Rally 3... It leaves everything else in the dust!

name: VROVPilot: Titanic
summary: Experience the bow of the Titanic wreck as captured by Magellan at the bottom of the North Atlantic Ocean. Immerse yourself as an ROV pilot to explore the wreck and complete missions to scan key features of this sleeping spectacle.

name: VR Jurassic Escape
summary: Welcome to the Dinosaur Island. There are thousands of various dinosaurs living in this beautiful and mysterious island. There are tyrannosauruses that dominates the land, pterodactyls flying in the sky, triceratops, stegosaurus and more.

name: VR Party Club
summary: Easy to learn VR fun for your friends and family! 1 to 4 players PARTY throw, roll, shoot, and slice their way to 1st place, in various board game and minigame environments! VR Party Club was designed for comfortable, intuitive gameplay that will delight both VR veterans and neophytes.6

name: VR Police Pursuit Alien Zombies
summary: Welcome to this exciting 3D VR zombie survival game, get ready for an adrenaline rush!

name: VR Traffic Safety with Polly
summary: VR Traffic Safety with Polly is an educational program using virtual reality (VR) technology. We provide psychological reports that analyze each child's participation, understanding and responses to identify areas where the child needs further training.

name: VRRCC
summary: Virtual Reality Radio Controlled Cars — the best RC car simulator in VR.You will see great physics, nice graphics and deep immersion! Do crazy stunts, modify tracks with objects and customize your car.

name: VR Lander: Lunar Edition
summary: Take a giant leap as you pilot the iconic lunar module to a precision landing on a miniature moon landscape in this modern reimagining of a classic moon lander game.

name: V Rising: Razer Night Serpent Pack
summary:
The Razer Night Serpent Pack was a limited promotional giveaway that unlocked 4 item crafting recipes for the Tier 1 Cape (short): Razer Serpent Wrap, Tier 2 Cape (medium): Razer Serpent Veil, Tier 3 Cape (long): Razer Serpent Mantle and Headwear: Razer Hood.

The new items can be obtained without the pack's crafting recipes as extra rare loot drops added to the game with it's announcement.

The giveaway was announced in June 2022 and repeated around Halloween the same year. The Tier 2 and 3 crafting recipes were tied to the game's normal progression, so the bosses Beatrice the Tailor and Sir Magnus the Overseer had to be defeated before they could be used.

name: VR Time Machine Travelling in History: Visit ancient Egypt, Babylon and Greece in B.C. 400
summary: The purpose of our game is to let more people know about the great civilizations of ancient Egypt and ancient Greece.

name: VR Dunk Assistant
summary: This game allows you to practice shooting from the comfort of your home, providing an immersive basketball experience and helping you improve your shooting skills anytime, anywhere.

name: V Rising
summary: Awaken as a vampire. Hunt for blood in nearby settlements to regain your strength and evade the scorching sun to survive. Raise your castle and thrive in an ever-changing open world full of mystery. Gain allies online and conquer the land of the living.

name: VR AstroSmash
summary: VRAstroSmash is a seated, casual scifi arcade style shooting VR only game. Destroy asteroids, space junk, and UFO'S. Up to 4k textures and 150000 polys. Ship auto upgrades through the game progression, such as auto fire, ship repair, increased weapon cooling, and flight controls.

name: VRC Pro: Deluxe Asia On-Road Tracks 2
summary: This VRC PRO: Deluxe Asia On-Road Tracks 2 pack gives you 5 additional, real existing Asian and Australian on-road RC tracks. Expand your outdoor on-road tracks. Experience real existing world class tracks. Join more events & more multiplayer sessions.

name: VR Drums Ultimate Streamer
summary: Virtual reality drumming in Meta Quest and PCVR. VR Drums Ult.

name: VR Boxing Workout
summary: Welcome to VR Boxing Workout, the virtual reality gym in your living room.

name: VRSO: Bare Knuckle Fighting
summary: VRSO: Bare Knuckle Fighting set in authentic abandoned arenas. Face off against 16 unique fighters in the pinnacle of VR sports. Hone your skills in detailed training, then challenge players worldwide. Experience cutting-edge movement in every punch and dodge. Become the ultimate VRSO champion!

name: VR Wonderland: mini civilizations in a forest
summary: This game will satisfy your fantasy. You will become a man/woman smaller than a rabbit, going through time and space through a magical stone door, and come to the mini-world island.

name: VRekken
summary: VRekken is a physics driven beat 'em up and self-defense trainer built for VR. You can use your punches, melee weapons (and kicks if you have 2 additional trackers) to beat up the bad guys. If you have been learning martial arts you can use your skills to your advantage.

name: VR Prison Showdown：rookie Guard Rumble
summary: This is a fascinating VR virtual reality fighting game. Players will start a fierce confrontation with prisoners on the prison ring.

name: VR Ground: Crazy Farm
summary: 'VR Ground: Crazy Farm' is a party game based on a clash between a farmer and animals who are stealing his apples. Farmer who is using VR and animals who are using smart device can choose one of 3 game modes to play and enjoy together.

name: VR Animal Kids Rumble
summary: This is a VR-type animal fighting game, which allows players to be in a dense forest to explore and challenge various small animals.

name: VRpatients
summary: Step into VR/MR as a nurse or paramedic and experience safe, fun, and realistic healthcare scenarios—no prior experience needed!

name: VR The Diner Duo
summary:
Your goal as a chef is to cook the food your customers want, in a very limited amount of time. You snooze - you lose!

Multiplayer mode is extremely fun! Let your partner, kid or sibling take the role as a waiter and take orders, fetch drinks and pie to your always hungry customers to keep them satisfied. The more you communicate - the better!

The chef is played in the VR-headset, while in multiplayer mode the waiter is played on the same computer with the keyboard or regular control.

You are able to customize your character, both chef and waiter. The more you play, the more customization options you will unlock. Rewards are waiting for the top chefs!

name: VR Squash 2017
summary:
Real competitive squash experience in VR - you will feel like hitting the ball with your virtual racket! 
Beat four increasingly difficult AI enemies in squash with your skills! The unique enemies will use different tactics to try to defeat you, difficulty is ranging from Sam the Slow to Mark the Monster! Are you up to the challenge?

name: VR Figure from Shining: Kirika Towa Alma
summary:
Players can interact with and date Kirika, the titular character and one of the heroines in Shining Resonance.

In the Figure Viewing mode, players can view Kirika for a range of angles using VR while the Event Viewing mode allows one to play through dating events.

name: VR Wilderness Survival
summary: You are trapped in a mine, and when night falls, wild animals will come to attack you. Use a machine gun to defend your camp.

name: VR Disc Golf
summary: VR Disc Golf is an online multi-player disc golf game where you can throw, chuck, and fly your way to victory through two virtual outrun environments. Includes over 40 great audio tracks. Single-player and local multi-player are also available. Play disc golf in virtual reality with your friends!

name: VR Fight Covid-19
summary: In 2020, Covid-19 swept the world. In order to save people in pain, Dr. A has developed nano-robots that can enter the human body to eliminate viruses. Everyone hopes that nano-robots can help them get rid of the disease.

name: VR Military Reporter in Middle East (with tanks & helicopters)
summary: This is a VR leisure tour game. Players can wear a helmet to tour the Middle East.

name: VR Slots 3D
summary: Try for free the first VR Slots in the world. Incredible gaming machines in one application. Start playing now and get free coins every day.

name: VRC Pro: Rally-X
summary: This Rally-X (cross) expansion pack contains a high-performance R/C rally car and 8 awesome rally tracks. You also get a set of Rally-X car bodies and high-end components to configure and customize your car. Electric 1:8 Rally-X chassis. Full car setup options. Extra car bodies and components. 3 New Rally tracks.

name: VRC Pro
summary: VRC Pro takes you deep into the world of cutting edge, modern RC cars. You can race up to 15 different RC cars on real existing mini race tracks all around the world; all fully customizable & tunable. With top speeds of around 120 km/h (75 Mph) and insane acceleration on ultra tight tracks; get ready to experience a whole new level of racing!

name: VR Aim Trainer
summary: The best way to improve your VR aim. VR Aim Trainer provides customizable training scenarios to improve your hand-eye coordination, accuracy, and your overall skill at VR shooters. Prove you're the best VR aimer by climbing to the top of our competitive leaderboards.

name: VR Fire Emergency Simulation System
summary:
VR Fire Escape Emergency Exercise System is a fire emergency simulation program produced by Hong Xing (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. It aims to make the experience masters the fire escape skills and understand through the immersive simulation operation Correct emergency measures to reduce their own injury.

The program built-in Chinese version and English version, you can switch within the program.

name: VR Katherine
summary: VR Katherine is a perfect girlfriend and sex simulator. Talk to her, interact with everything! We added Artificial Intelligence to add extreme realism to all interactions! You are in control here! Choose what you want to do!

name: V Rising: Legacy of Castlevania - Premium Pack
summary:
Introducing the Legacy of Castlevania Premium Pack in collaboration with Konami Digital Entertainment. This pack includes new cosmetics that allow you to take on the storied aesthetics of hair, clothing, and forms from one of the all-time classic Vampire franchises. Invoke style and indulge in your Castlevania nostalgia alongside the action-packed V Rising experience you’ve come to know and love.

The Legacy of Castlevania Premium Pack contains Alucard’s Regalia, a 5 piece cosmetic set, that can be crafted in-game using cloth and coarse thread when you unlock the tailor bench. 3 unique shapeshifting variants with the Wolf Form variant: Soul of the Wolf, Human Form variant: Glamour of Maria Renard and Toad Form variant: Guise of The Flea Man. 5 new hairstyles with Alucard, the Lecarde sisters and two Succubus variants. Rowdain's famed skeletal steed and adaptations of the Castlevania music tracks "Bloody Tears" and "Simon’s Theme" by V Rising composer Aleksandria Migova.

Then drape your walls, floors, and most valued places of power in the style of Castlevania with the Ancient Symphony item set that includes the Coffin, Throne, 5 Wallpaper Variants, Floor Pattern, Gate with a Servant Lock variant, 4 Stairs variants, Carpet (Corner, End, Straight, T-Section, X-Section), Candelabra, Glass Window - Wraith, Glass Window - Vampire, Blood Fountain, 2 Paintings, Statue of Alucard, Statue of Maria, Evolved Being (Statue), Bone Trophy and Angelic Statue.

name: VR Driver School
summary: Do you think taking a driver's license is very difficult! Especially subjects two and three are easy to fail! The unique driving test simulator makes it easy to learn and practice driving. It can effectively grasp the viewpoint and timing of turning the steering wheel.

name: V-Rally: Championship Edition
summary: V-Rally is a rally racing video game released in 1997 and known for its mix of licensed vehicles and varied track conditions. It features 11 official rally cars and more than 40 courses with dynamic weather, terrain, and time-of-day variations. Players can fine-tune vehicle settings such as suspension, gear ratios, and steering before competing across three main modes: Arcade, Championship, and Time Trial. In Arcade mode, players advance through competitions grouped by difficulty, each consisting of four stages. Championship mode presents an eight-race tournament with points awarded for top-three finishes, while Time Trial mode focuses on racing against the clock or another vehicle for the fastest time.

name: VR Atlantis Search: with Deep Diving
summary: In the game, players will move through each level to find the stone gate and finally obtain the treasure map. The humanoid guards will patrol outside the treasure map for a long time, pay attention to avoiding and obtain the treasure.

name: VR Girls' Room in Darkness
summary: In 2008, a girl named Kimmy disappeared strangely. Her parents searched for her for a long time but failed to find her, so they left this sad land. Twelve years later, you found this uninhabited house during an accidental trip.

name: VR Hero Sentry
summary: This VR ARPG makes you take up arms and choose your hero, class and your own build as you fight off hordes and titanic bosses and offers you infinite gameplay and endless customization. Upgrade your spells, buy armor and weapons, build your army and increase your hero stats to stop the underworld.

name: VR Dream Match Baseball
summary:
VR Dream Match Baseball is experience to challenge Big League pitchers. 
 
Challenge a pro’s fastballs and breaking balls as a batter and catcher! With true hitting/catching sensation. You can experience a real pitcher’s balls in a big league baseball stadium with realistic sensation as a catcher or batter.

name: V Rising: Sinister Evolution Pack
summary: Embrace the new world of technology and become the dark alchemist you were meant to be. Light your breathtaking halls with the glow of bio-luminous bubbling lanterns. Fill your halls with beautiful bronze, cured wood, and gleaming glass lined with the remnants of experimental monstrosities.

name: VR Dodgeball Trainer
summary: VR Dodgeball Trainer was designed from the ground up by professional dodgeball players to give you the dodging prowess to survive out on the court. Watch out as these red menaces soar over your dome, leaving you constantly on your toes. Can you take on waves of enemies as the pressure rises?

name: VR Adventure (Virtual Reality for mobile devices)
summary: The game developed on Unity3D with one pair of hands :=)

name: VR Mini Bowling
summary: Welcome to the world of Mini Bowling! In this VR game bowling meets mini golf to create a totally new experience!

name: VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis
summary: In this VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis game, you can have an immersive experience to travel through a black hole. What kind of unknown world did you reach after crossing? Start your adventure.

name: VR Karts SteamVR
summary:
** This version of VR Karts is designed specifically and only compatible for HTC Vive **

The checkered flag is about to drop on a new Virtual Reality racing experience!
Get in the drivers’ seat of your own customized kart and race against other players from around the world.
Race through stunning environments, collect power ups and use weapons to gain the upper hand over other racers.
VR Karts is a fun and family-friendly Virtual Reality racing game designed specifically for the HTC Vive

name: VR Hiroshima 1945
summary: This is a sad story, a tragic moment. In the summer of 1945, atomic weapons were used for the first time in human history.

name: VR Golf Online
summary: When Golf meets the limitless possibilities of Virtual Reality, the green is only inches away! Practice your swing and develop your techniques to improve your handicap. Step onto one of the 36 realistic holes, with additional courses planned for the near future. VR Golf Online can be played as a singleplayer (practice) mode, against AI opponents, or against your friends for a game of local and/or online multiplayer. Compete and become the golf pro you've always wanted to be!

name: VR-Kanojo
summary: – An unexplored world for just the two of you is here! - The long-awaited new work from the producer of "VR Kanojo" is even more fun and cuter than ever! --Introducing "VR-Kanojo"-- Experience the special moment everyone dreams of: your girlfriend visiting your room for the first time!

name: VR Hentai Date

name: VR Secretary: Ailey Edition
summary: VR Secretary puts you in a real office situation. You think you can handle anything, but the relationship with your secretary, Ailey? Cross the line, and your workplace journey might become unexpectedly “eventful”. Being a CEO may not be quite what you imagined.

name: VR Hentai Girl

name: Vribyss Refuge: Metamorphosis

name: VR the Anime Girls Method
summary:
Pretty girls support your exercise!
You can lose weight in an extremely beautiful VR space.
This is the best exercise game that you've never seen before!
（※There are individual difference how you can lose weight）

name: VRider SBK
summary:
VRider SBK is the first-ever Virtual Reality Superbike racing simulator built from the ground up for an immersive VR racing experience. Designed to deliver the raw thrill of real two-wheel racing, it puts you in full control—every tilt, throttle, and turn is yours to master.

Get ready for next-gen racing, built with an optimized rendering pipeline that fully leverages the power of Steam VR for maximum performance and immersion.

name: VR Houses: Glass Apartment
summary: VR Houses: Glass Apartment is a groundbreaking experience where photorealism takes center stage. Step beyond the borders of traditional VR games and immerse yourself in a hyper-realistic digital environment.

name: VR Audio Visualizer
summary: You are welcome to enjoy an incredible world of sonic virtual reality. Look at visualization of your favorite songs and melodies with 6 impressive visualizer.

name: VR Fighter Jets War
summary: This is a VR immersive flight shooting game with exquisite and gorgeous graphics. The overall environment is mainly based on aerial combat. High-fidelity sound effects provide players with a different shooting experience.

name: V Rising: Founder's Pack - Eldest Bloodline
summary:
This pack has been created for those who want to show off some extra love for V Rising and kindly wish to support the game further. The Founder’s Pack: Eldest Bloodline rewards your support by unlocking exclusive items that will make you stand out on your vampire journey. Get three legendary shapeshift skins, exclusive castle customizations, the original soundtrack, and a bunch of great accessories to take your dark elegance to the next level.

The Founder’s Pack: Eldest Bloodline contains a shapeshifting variant for the bear, human and wolf forms, 27 Gargoyle Statues with 3 shared variant types, 6 Gargoyle Ornaments to hang off your pillars, 16 Vampire Accessories to enhance your vampiric style and V Rising's original soundtrack by Aleksandria Migova with 18 tracks.

While you have this DLC, all items unlock and become available in-game to be crafted as you become worthy of crafting equivalent equipment.

name: VR Treasure Raider
summary: After years of research, the entrance to an ancient island has been discovered. Beyond its doors are rumored to be riches guarded by cunning monsters and lethal traps. Be wary or be entombed. Good luck and have fun with virtual reality.

name: VR Invaders
summary: Dive into a virtual sci-fi world as the freelance hacker Thomas Hall to save a cyber artist that got stuck in virtual reality. Fight legions of enemy drones with your multi-functional loadout. Slow time, transform your weapon and blast through your enemies in this immersive VR shooter.

name: VRC Pro: Deluxe Nitro On-Road Tracks
summary: This VRC PRO: Deluxe Nitro On-Road Tracks pack gives you 5 additional on-road RC tracks from all around the world. Expand your nitro on-road tracks. Experience real existing world class tracks. Join more events & more multiplayer sessions.

summary:
Requires Oculus Rift DK1 / DK2 headset.

Get in the drivers’ seat and experience racing like never before.

Build a deck of vehicles and deploy them into battle against other players online. It ends in destruction.

name: VRChat

Jump into hundreds of awe-inspiring environments and meet unique avatars every day. Watch a movie on the moon. Ride the Titanic. Step into a new world every time you come online. In VRChat, you are one of us. Enjoy your stay.

name: VR Furballs: Demolition
summary: VR Furballs: Demolition is the VR physics-based demolition puzzle game you were waiting for! Help our cute Furballs deliver all their furry friends by demolishing the evil Baddies and their constructions! Unlock the 12 Tools and 6 Mini-games for even more fun! Create new levels in the Level Editor!

name: VR Ping Pong Pro
summary: Rackets at the ready! VR Ping Pong Pro is the follow up to the hit table tennis simulator of 2016, VR Ping Pong. Test your skills with a variety of challenging game modes, as you rise up the ranks to become the true Ping Pong Pro! Do you have what it takes? Pick up your virtual racket and find out!

name: VR Ping Pong Pro
summary: Rackets at the ready! VR Ping Pong Pro is the follow up to the hit table tennis simulator of 2016, VR Ping Pong. Test your skills with a variety of challenging game modes, as you rise up the ranks to become the true Ping Pong Pro! Do you have what it takes? Pick up your virtual racket and find out!

name: V Rising: Dracula's Relics Pack
summary:
Embrace your dark legacy and project your intentions of supremacy with the Dracula’s Relics pack.

Strikeout into Vardoran in iconic black, red, and gold. Don the Immortal King’s Mantle and mark yourself a commander of death with the Immortal King’s Greathelm as your battle crown. Whether on the battlefield or resting atop your extravagant throne, these colors represent a vampire with an ambition worthy of the next Dracula.

Return home to a castle worthy of the scourge of Vardoran. From throne to coffin, walls to floors, carpet runs to brilliant braziers, your castle will project regality. The royal decor will project an unmistakable air of dominance, elegance, and taste.

name: VR Store Simulator
summary: Step into a dynamic VR supermarket! Manage your store, stock shelves, cater to customers, and create the ultimate shopping destination . Perfect for fun and learning, this immersive simulation lets you strategize and thrive in supermarket management. Ready to start?

summary: V-RACER HOVERBIKE is a fast-paced futuristic racing game in VR.

name: VR Party Pack
summary: It's great for both small groups of close friends and large group of party people! VR Party Pack is a local multiplayer game designed for beginner to advanced virtual reality users. Only one VR headset required!

name: Vroom Data Disk
summary:
This data disc for Vroom adds 6 new Grand Prix circuits (Montreal, Monza, Hockenheimring, Estoril, São Paulo and Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez).

This data disk requires original Vroom game.

name: VRiking
summary: VRiking is a Runner game in VR! Accelerate as fast as you can while collecting points along the way! Dodge the approaching obstacles!

name: VR Puzzle Box
summary: Accept incredible brain twister challenge - try immersive VR experience that is simple, but very exciting.

name: Vrast!
summary: It's the "innovative fighting game" where you can fight using the "your VRM model"!

name: VR King Arthur's Sword in Romano Britania
summary: This is a VR leisure travel game for visiting ancient Rome.

summary: VR Flight Simulator: realistic cockpit, physics, sounds, airport, terrain, more.

name: VR Dinosaur Hunter: City Dino Survival Game 3D
VR UAV Attack
summary: This is a drone-themed VR shooting game, suitable for flying shooting players who like war story backgrounds.

name: VR Retreat
summary: VR Retreat is a place to meditate, chill and play relaxing games in virtual reality. Enjoy different game modes, music and environments and play at your own pace.

summary: Ported directly from the open source project, VRogue is the classic game Rogue in an entirely new perspective: Virtual Reality! Dare the Dungeons of Doom to deliver the Amulet of Yendor... and then find your way back out!

summary: Personate a real crane master and put containers in the appropriate place. Remember that time is running by and the more containers you put, the more points you get.

summary: This is a VR retro arcade game, you will enter the game console to fight your opponents! Players can switch between weapons such as bows and arrows, spells, and fists.

name: VRC Pro: GT3 Chassis and Components
summary: DLC containing the 1:8 nitro onroad GT3 Modified chassis, wheels, rubber tires, 3.5cc .21 engine, exhaust pipe and the beautiful new P911 GT3 and the C7 body which come different paintschemes with 8 color schemes. The modified RS chassis has full setup options, ideal for the die-hard nitro on-road racer to tune the chassis to his liking.

name: VR Return to the Middle Ages: Fully Interactive

name: VRFS
summary:
VRFS, or Virtual Reality Football (Soccer) Simulator is a community-driven soccer (football) simulator with focus on realistic physics and competitive multiplayer.

Here are the main features of VRFS:
- PHYSICS SIMULATION: Players can perform almost any trick, from balancing the ball on the tip of their foot to executing curved power shots and long passes. The ball's trajectory is solely determined by the physics engine.

- COMPETITIVE MULTIPLAYER: The multiplayer architecture allows for instantaneous ball-touch response. For example, players can finish powerful crosses at the same speed as in real soccer.

- COMFORT: Players can move around using thumbsticks and play in either a seated or standing position. No intense hand movements are required.

- NO PAY-TO-WIN in VRFS: Only skills matter. No one can buy 'stronger kicks' or 'faster boots.' Keep practicing, and you'll see improvement.

- FREE FOR ALL: Players have full access to the game without needing to purchase anything. However, if you wish, you can buy cool equipment in the store to support the further development of this project.

Please keep in mind that VRFS is still in development, with upcoming upgrades to the physics and scenery. We'd appreciate your suggestions for any enhancements.

Find the clue,solve the puzzle one by one, find the way out the room.
Many interesting objects are interactive and playable, some of them are useful, while others are just for fun.

name: VR Flush
summary: You are sitting on a toilet when you are abducted and beamed up to an alien spaceship, where you have to convince an A.I. that you really are an intelligent lifeform.

name: VR Crazy Racing
summary: This is a casual game of racing racing. Players put on helmets and sit in the cockpit to compete with computer racing. Be careful not to collide with them, to ensure the speed, and to avoid mistakes and rush to the first place.

name: VR Stock Car Racers
summary:
SAT-BOX's 2nd VR racing game presented 「VR STOCK CAR RACERS」
Let's ride a stock car and run a circuit that can run only on VR.
For example, sea, mountain, night city......
Feel the world of high speed exceeding average 300km/h!
The stock car equipped with nitro is over 500km/h!!!

name: VR Jurassic island roller coaster
summary: This is a VR adventure game where players will drive a roller coaster from a first-person perspective to experience the scenery of two different worlds.

name: V-Rally 4
summary:
Get ready to take on the challenges of rallies, rallycross, drifts, buggies and hill climbs, and set off on a spectacular journey across continents. At the wheel of the most legendary off-road vehicles in each category, you’ll have to be prepared to take on the most difficult routes in astonishing surroundings.
Over 50 car models will be featured, including the most famous in rallying and extreme motor sport. Ready for you to test drive, collect, upgrade, customize, and above all excel at!
As no trip is worth anything unless it is shared, V-Rally 4 will feature a career mode and an innovative online mode.

name: Vroom in the night sky
summary: A fantasy motorcycle game by Poisoft that launches on Nintendo Switch.

name: VR Async Balls
summary: It's a simulator of a slot machine. Swipe two balls simultaneously on different moving tracks. Do not try to push two balls at the same time moving your hands asynchronous, not everyone can do it. Check if you can do it! 20 levels in the game, each of them is more difficult than the previous one.

name: VR Mini World Roller Coaster
summary: This game is a casual game, players can experience a different roller coaster ride with a helmet. Players can control the running speed of the roller coaster by themselves, which can not only experience the thrill at high speed, but also stop to enjoy the beautiful scenery.

name: VR Relaxation Space Room
summary: VR space cruise-ship hotel relax room. Listen to music, watch videos and read ebooks while exploring the universe.

name: V-Rally Edition '99
summary: Racing insanity! Over 40 original tracks, 11 official World Rally Championship cars, tracks in 8 worldwide locations, realistic race physics and smooth car handling, diverse terrain such as jungles, canyons, deserts, mountains and more, unstable weather patterns like rain, fog, snow and cloudy. Adjust car performance characteristics to suit varied road conditions. Bonus and hidden cars and tracks to unlock!

name: VR Tribes: The VR Edition
summary: VR vs PC. Show which player is stronger. VR TRIBES is an action-packed online multiplayer battle. One in VR and up to three as PC players. As VR player you have to conquer the island. The PC players have to join together to attack and defeat the VR player.

name: VRobot: VR Giant Robot Destruction Simulator
summary: Something went wrong, robots and driverless cars flooded the entire planet. Humans built a Giant Robot to help them clean and reclaim their cities. Operate the Giant Robot. Use special tools like Tractor Beam and Tornado Maker. Defeat SuperRobot 3000. Let people return to their homes.

name: Vreal
summary: Vreal is the first broadcast platform for VR games; create and watch VR game content all within VR. Party up with friends and explore VR gameplay together, all from your own perspectives. Vreal is now in Early Access; come try us for free!

name: VR Training: Work At Height
summary: Work At Height VR Training Train your professional skills in Work At Height VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: VR Catgirl Isle 2100
summary: This is a fascinating VR leisure game, a game with giant catwoman is about to begin.

name: VR Training: Lockout Tagout
summary: Lockout Tagout (LOTO) VR Training Train your professional skills in Lockout Tagout VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: VR Ping Pong Paradise
summary:
You can play table tennis in outer space!!
You feel refreshed! You can choose 6 play zones in this game.
Sky Arena , On the raft , Under the cherry trees , Street basketball court , Seaside golf course , Outer space.
You can enjoy ping pong in an unreal world.

name: VR Pigeons
summary: Use the power of VR and absolutely unique movement controls to slip into your pigeon-self! Bob your head back and forth to move around and eat all the bread. All the world’s a rooftop, and all the men and women merely pigeons.

name: VR Kart 360
summary: Strap into your VR headsets and dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of Kart 360 VR! Get ready for an unparalleled immersive kart racing experience where speed meets skill, and legends are forged in the heat of intense virtual competition.

name: VR Ninja Dojo
summary: VR NINJA DOJO offers an exciting training program that uses your entire body. Heated melee combat wielding swords, precise long-range attacks with shurikens, evasion training to dodge enemy attacks, and training to master ninjutsu await you.

name: VR Soccer
summary:
VR Soccer (sometimes referred to as VR Soccer '96, and known as Actua Soccer in Japan and Europe) is a sports video game developed and published by Gremlin Interactive for MS-DOS, PlayStation, Sega Saturn.

This was the first sports video game to include a full 3D graphics engine. For the animations of the players, 3 players of the club Sheffield Wednesday served as motion capture models.

Actua Soccer contains only 44 national teams, each containing 22 players. However, in 1996 a new version containing clubs was released: Actua Soccer: Club Edition. It contained 20 Premier League teams from the 1996/1997 season. It became a best seller in Europe, mainly in the United Kingdom.
